name: etesync
description: EteSync Server provides a self-hosted backend for secure, end-to-end encrypted contacts, calendars, and tasks. It works with EteSync clients to keep personal information synchronized across devices while preserving privacy.
features: End-to-End Encryption: Contacts and calendars encrypted on device. Zero-knowledge privacy.
Cross-Device Sync: Keep data synchronized across all devices. Seamless access everywhere.
CalDAV & CardDAV: Standard protocols for compatibility. Works with existing apps.
Task Management: Encrypted to-do lists and tasks. Private productivity.
Client Apps: Native apps for Android, iOS, and desktop. Complete ecosystem.
Self-Hosted: Run your own sync server. Complete data sovereignty.
